title: Legendary Legacy Skins
body: Is it just me or are the legendary legacy skins e.g. Alien Invader Heimerdinger, Firefighter Trist. not appearing in the store. https://gyazo.com/9a7ccb66a96f55af360eda25ed4143ba this is a screenshot of the heimer skins in the store (i dont own any of his skins) and alien invader is not there, same with the other legacy legendary ones.

replies.body:
I Hoped on my smurf account and it looks like the skin "Alien Invader Heimerdinger" is appeared on the store heres proof screenshot: http://prntscr.com/9hlkah 

Note:It did take a few secs for the splash art to load...If its not showing up then restart your client ....


Tell me if you fixed this :)
its fixed now, i had to restart my pc, restarting the client didnt work which is odd. thanks anyway
